CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The blend films showed almost equivalently measured smooth surfaces ( according to their root-mean-square ( rms ) roughness ) with small degrees of phase separation.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| blend films |

The other term "small degrees of phase separation" is not a material name, but rather a property or characteristic of the material.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The blend films showed almost equivalently measured smooth surfaces ( according to their root-mean-square ( rms ) roughness ) with small degrees of phase separation.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| almost equivalently measured |
| small degrees |
| root-mean-square (rms) roughness |

The three "Property Value" entities identified from the paragraph are "almost equivalently measured," "small degrees," and "root-mean-square (rms) roughness." These entities are mentioned as properties of the smooth surfaces of the blend films.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| root-mean-square (rms) roughness |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, only one "Property Value" entity is clearly referring to the value of a material property, which is "root-mean-square (rms) roughness." This property value is a measure of the roughness of the smooth surfaces of the blend films. The other entities, "almost equivalently measured" and "small degrees," are more related to the comparison of the property values rather than the values themselves.
